PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: We moved all the furniture.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Change the following sentences into future tense.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: We will move all the furniture.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: The bus stops suddenly.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Change the following sentences into future tense.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: An old man opens the door.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Change the following sentences into future tense.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: An old man will open the door.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: I see a lion in the forest.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Change the following sentences into future tense.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: I will see a lion in the forest.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: We clean the classroom.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Change the following sentences into future tense.

PR_QUESTIONS.PR_QUESTION: Mrs Kiran rang the bell for the recess.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_DESCRIPTION: Change the following sentences into future tense.
PR_QUESTIONS.PR_ANSWER: Mrs Kiran will ring the bell for the recess.
